page.title: 12RECREATION AND LEISURE P.1
page.content: The recreation and leisure facilities of Tattingstone and Wherstead depend a lot on local clubs. The Tennis Club. The courts are in Tattingstone's playing fields. There are 3 grass courts and 1 hard court. Tennis membership for a year costs Â£2.50 for juniors,Â£5.00 for adults and Â£12.00 for a family subscription. You can play any time you want. There is an under 14 league, an under 16 league and an adult league. There are about 40 junior members and 20 adult members. The Cricket Club. It has 20 members. The Football Club. This has 40 members. There is an under 21 team and an over 21 team. They play in the Tolly Cobbold League.
